name: Kick Litter: Nine-Step Program for Recovering Litter Addicts
description:
Potty train your cats in 2-8 weeks! Kick Litter is a 9-time award-winning guidebook for teaching your kitten or cat to jump up to the toilet and use it like their humans. The book jacket folds open into an easy-to-follow illustrated poster featuring Moxie and Cooper's "nine-step intervention program." Wean your furry ones off litter and onto the bowl!
  • FREE SHIPPING in the US!
  • Tax only in CA
  • "Kick Litter Certificate of Completion" ships with every book (not available elsewhere)
  • For international orders: order more than one book and all extras are shipped FREE!

    • Kick Litter won two gold medalsâ€”from the Indie Book Awards and from the Mom's Choice Awards. A Best In Show from PINC Awards, and a Bronze IPPY Award. The book was featured in Modern Cat, Boing Boing, People Magazine's People's Pets, Animal Fair Magazine, Graphic Design USA and in HOW International Design Annual.
    Recommended for potty training indoor cats. For environmental impact statement and health alerts (including comprehensive info on Toxoplasma gondii), please check out the links at the bottom of our full site: Kick Litter.

name: Kick Litter Pre-Release Review Copy
description: For HUGE fans of the book, this limited edition pre-release version of Kick Litter is available exclusively from the official Kick Litter store. Months before a book is printed, review copies (also called "galleys") are specially printed and distributed to the press. They're useful for reviewers and for the book's designers to see how it reads, and if the vision lives up to holding it in our hands. Review copies are a short-run. For a color novelty book, photography book or children's book, a review copy is usually done on a digital printing press, so the quality isn't as high as the final versions. Review copies also vary slightly from the final book. In our case, no poster or book jacket was printed. We've now got eleven copies left, and are making them available here as collector's items until they're sold out. Shipping is free, and tax is collected only from California residents. If you want a copy of the final book too add Kick Litter to your cart here.
